author: sky.cactus
content: <@191378736254287874> not sure if you saw my comment in https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3351#pullrequestreview-622631405 but I am waiting to coordinate merge with you or some other person with EIPs repository admin access.  cc <@104006934562107392>

author: hudsonjameson
content: <@301186049323958275> I did miss it, thanks for pinging me. Happy to coordinate. Best way to do this is to make a private group with parties that are necessary and who will be monitoring. I can make you admin temporarily as well, but will try to be available as much as possible to help.

author: sky.cactus
content: If I'm admin I can do it whenever.  I just want to make sure that if things go south we don't end up with the EIPs repository broken for days.  ðŸ˜„

author: sky.cactus
content: If I'm not an admin, that just means scheduling a time to click the button when an admin is "available".

content: Oh, also there are a couple buttons that need to be clicked that only admins have access to.
